description:
Jimbei and Luffy continue their standoff, the New Fish-Man pirates go on a rampage, and Hordy begins to experience startling side effects from his pill-popping habit!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hody no Ihen: Kyouyaku no Shin no Chikara!
La transformation de Hody. Le véritable pouvoir de la drogue maléfique.
Something Has Happened to Hordy! The True Power of the Evil Drug!
Происшествие с Ходи! Истинная сила зловещих наркотиков!
حدث شيء لهودي! قوة عقار الشر الحقيقيّة!
ホーディの異変 凶薬の真の力!
